name: src/cj.js
Collection
description: Collection+Json utility object.

name: getErrorMessage
description: Get the error message from the collection object.

return.description: error message

name: getLinkRelationUrls
description: Get the list of urls for a link relation from a collection or item object.

return.description: list of urls

name: getItemDescriptors
description: Get an item's data (descriptors).

return.description: object whose properties and values are the item's descriptor names and values respectively

name: getUrl
description: Get the url of the representation given by a collection obj.

return.description: url of the resource representation

name: getTotalNumberOfItems
description: Get the total number of items from a collection object.

return.description:
total number of items or -1 if the collection objects
doesn't contain that information

name: getTemplateDescriptorNames
description: Get the list of descriptor names within a collection's template object.

return.description: list of descriptor names

name: getQueryParameters
description: Get the list of descriptor names within a Collection+Json query array.

return.description: list of query parameter names

name: createCollectionObj
description: Create an empty Collection+Json object.

return.description: template object

name: makeTemplate
description:
Make a Collection+Json template object from a regular object whose properties are
the item descriptors.

return.description: template object

name: src/client.js
Client
description: API client object.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: url
params.description: url of the ChRIS store service

name: setUrls
description: Set the urls of the high level API resources.

return.description: JS Promise

name: getPluginMetas
description:
Get a paginated list of plugin metas from the REST API given query search
parameters. If no search parameters then get the default first page.

params.name: searchParams.id
params.description: match plugin meta id exactly with this number

params.name: searchParams.name
params.description: match plugin meta name containing this string

params.name: searchParams.name_exact
params.description: match plugin meta name exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.title
params.description: match plugin meta title containing this string

params.name: searchParams.type
params.description: match plugin meta type exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.category
params.description: match plugin meta category exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.authors
params.description: match plugin meta authors containing this string

params.name: searchParams.min_creation_date
params.description: match feed creation date gte this date

params.name: searchParams.max_creation_date
params.description: match feed creation date lte this date

params.name: searchParams.name_title_category
params.description:
match plugin meta name, title or
category containing this string

params.name: searchParams.name_authors_category
params.description:
match plugin meta name, authors or
category containing this string

params.name: searchParams.owner_username
params.description:
match plugin meta owner's username exactly
with this string

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginMetaList`` object

name: getFavoritePluginMetas
description: Fetch a list of authenticated user's favorite plugin metas from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``UserFavoritePluginMetaList`` object

name: getCollabPluginMetas
description: Fetch a list of authenticated user's collaborated plugin metas from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``UserCollabPluginMetaList`` object

name: getPluginMeta
description: Get a plugin meta resource object given its id.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginMeta`` object

name: getPluginStars
description:
Get a paginated list of authenticated-user-specific plugin star data (descriptors)
given query search parameters. If no search parameters is given then get the default
first page.

params.name: searchParams.id
params.description: match plugin star id exactly with this number

params.name: searchParams.plugin_name
params.description: match plugin name exactly with this string

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginStarList`` object

name: getPluginStar
description: Get an authenticated-user-specific plugin star resource object given its id.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginStar`` object

name: createPluginStar
description: Create a new plugin star resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``PluginStar`` object

name: createPluginCollaborator
description: Create a new plugin collaborator resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``PluginCollaborator`` object

name: getPlugins
description:
Get a paginated list of plugin data (descriptors) given query search
parameters. If no search parameters is given then get the default first
page.

params.name: searchParams.id
params.description: match plugin id exactly with this number

params.name: searchParams.name
params.description: match plugin name containing this string

params.name: searchParams.name_latest
params.description:
match plugin name containing this string
and return only the latest version

params.name: searchParams.name_exact
params.description: match plugin name exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.name_exact_latest
params.description:
match plugin name exactly with this string
and return only the latest version

params.name: searchParams.dock_image
params.description: match plugin docker image exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.type
params.description: match plugin type with this string

params.name: searchParams.category
params.description: match plugin category containing this string

params.name: searchParams.owner_username
params.description: match plugin username containing this string

params.name: searchParams.min_creation_date
params.description: match plugin creation date after this date

params.name: searchParams.max_creation_date
params.description: match plugin creation date before this date

params.name: searchParams.title
params.description: match plugin title containing this string

params.name: searchParams.version
params.description: match plugin version exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.description
params.description: match plugin description containing this string

params.name: searchParams.name_title_category
params.description:
match plugin name, title or category
containing this string

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginList`` object

name: getPlugin
description: Get a plugin resource object given its id.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Plugin`` object

name: createPlugin
description: Create a new plugin resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``Plugin`` object

name: getPipelines
description:
Get a paginated list of pipeline data (descriptors) given query search parameters.
If no search parameters is given then get the default first page.

params.name: searchParams.id
params.description: match pipeline id exactly with this number

params.name: searchParams.name
params.description: match pipeline name containing this string

params.name: searchParams.category
params.description: match pipeline category containing this string

params.name: searchParams.owner_username
params.description: match pipeline's owner username exactly with this string

params.name: searchParams.description
params.description: match pipeline description containing this string

params.name: searchParams.authors
params.description: match pipeline authors containing this string

params.name: searchParams.min_creation_date
params.description: match pipeline creation date after this date

params.name: searchParams.max_creation_date
params.description: match pipeline creation date before this date

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PipelineList`` object

name: getPipeline
description: Get a pipeline resource object given its id.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Pipeline`` object

name: createPipeline
description: Create a new pipeline resource through the REST API.

params.name: data.plugin_tree
params.description: JSON string containing a plugin tree list

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``Pipeline`` object

name: getUser
description: Get a user resource object for the currently authenticated user.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``User`` object

name: createUser
description: Create a new user account.

params.name: usersUrl
params.description: url of the user accounts service

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``User`` object

name: getAuthToken
description: Fetch a user's login authorization token from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``string`` value

name: runAsyncTask
description: Helper method to run an asynchronous task defined by a task generator function.

name: _fetchRes
description: Internal method to fetch a high level resource through the REST API.

params.name: resUrlProp
params.description: property of the `this` object containing the url of the resource

return.description: JS Promise

name: src/exception.js
RequestException
description: Custom exception object.

name: src/index.js
src/pipeline.js
Pipeline
description: Pipeline item resource object representing a pipeline.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPluginPipings

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PipelinePluginPipingList`` object

description:
Fetch a list of plugin piping default parameter values for the plugin
pipings composing the pipeline from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PipelinePipingDefaultParameterList`` object

name: put
description: Make a PUT request to modify this pipeline resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: delete
description: Make a DELETE request to delete this pipeline resource through the REST API.

name: PipelineList
description: Pipeline list resource object representing a list of pipelines.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: getPlugins
description: Fetch a list of plugins from the REST API.

params.name: searchParams
params.description:
search parameters object which is
resource-specific, the ``PluginList.getSearchParameters`` method can be
used to get a list of possible search parameters

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginList`` object

name: post
description:
Make a POST request to this pipeline list resource to create a new pipeline
item resource through the REST API.

params.name: data.plugin_tree
params.description: JSON string containing a plugin tree list

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: PluginPiping
description:
Plugin piping item resource object representing a plugin piping within
a pipeline.

description: Constructor

name: getPreviousPluginPiping
description:
Fetch the parent plugin piping within the corresponding pipeline from the
REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``PluginPiping`` object or ``null``

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the corresponding plugin for this plugin piping from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Plugin`` object

name: getPipeline
description: Fetch the corresponding pipeline for this plugin piping from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``Pipeline`` object

name: PipingDefaultParameter
description:
Item resource object for a plugin piping defaul parameter representing a
default value for a plugin parameter associated with this plugin piping.

description: Constructor

Fetch the corresponding plugin piping for this plugin piping default
parameter from the REST API.

name: getPluginParameter
description:
Fetch the corresponding plugin parameter for this plugin piping default

Pipeline-specific plugin list resource object representing a list of plugins

custom object with a property with the same name as

custom object with a property with the same name as

params.name: uploadFileObj

custom object with a property with the same name as
the API descriptor corresponding to the file and whose value is the file blob

name: src/resource.js
Resource
description: API abstract resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: isEmpty
description: Return true if the resource object contains any data.

name: clone
description: Make a deep copy clone of this object resource.

return.description: clone object

name: ItemResource
description: API abstract item resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description: Fetch this item resource from the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: data
description: Get the item's data object (REST API descriptors).

name: getPUTParameters
description:
Get an array of parameter names that can be used as properties of the data
object in PUT requests.

return.description:
array of PUT data property name or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet or it doesn't support
PUT requests.

name: _getResource
description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API that is referenced
by a link relation within the item object.

params.name: searchParams
params.description: search parameters object which is resource-specific

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``ResourceClass`` object

throws.description:
throw error if this item resource has not yet been
fetched from the REST API
throw error when the link relation is not found

name: _put
description:
Internal helper method to make a PUT request to this item resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: _delete
description:
Internal helper method to make a DELETE request to this item resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise

name: ListResource
description: API abstract list resource class.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description:
Fetch this list resource from the REST API based on search parameters. If
no search parameters then get the default first page.

params.name: searchParams
params.description:
search parameters object which is
resource-specific, the ``getSearchParameters`` method can be used to get a list
of possible search parameters

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: getSearchParameters
description:
Get an array of search parameter names that can be used as properties of the
``searchParams`` argument to the ``get`` method.

return.description:
array of search parameter names or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet.

name: getItem
description:
Get an item resource object given its id from the list of items in this
list resource object.

return.description: an instance of ``this.itemClass``

name: getItems
description:
Get an array of item resource objects corresponding to the items in this
list resource object.

name: data
description: Get the list of item data objects (REST API descriptors).

name: totalCount
description:
Get the total count of items of the entire collection across pages in the
paginated REST API. Return -1 if no data has been fetched or the total
number of items info is not available from the fetched data.

name: hasNextPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a next list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: hasPreviousPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a previous list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: getPOSTParameters
description:
Get an array of parameter names that can be used as properties of the data
object in POST requests.

return.description:
array of POST data properties or null if this list
resource's data has not been fetched from the API yet or it doesn't support
POST requests.

name: _getResource
description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API that is
referenced by a link relation within this list resource's collection object.

params.name: searchParams
params.description: search parameters object which is resource-specific

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to a ``ResourceClass`` object

throws.description:
throw error if this list resource has not yet
been fetched from the REST API
throw error when the link relation is not found

name: _post
description:
Internal helper method to make a POST request to this list resource through
the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: src/user.js
User
description: User item resource object representing a user of the system.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: put
description: Make a PUT request to modify this user item resource through the REST API.

return.description: JS Promise, resolves to ``this`` object

name: ./APIDocumentation.md

content:
{
  "name": "@fnndsc/chrisstoreapi",
  "version": "3.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "dist/chrisstoreapi.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "precommit": "lint-staged",
    "start": "karma start",
    "test": "karma start --single-run",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "src/**/*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ],
    "*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "prettier": {
    "printWidth": 100,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "overrides": [
      {
        "files": "*.css",
        "options": {
          "useTabs": false,
          "tabWidth": 2
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@types/chai": "^4.1.3",
    "@types/mocha": "^9.0.0",
    "@types/sinon": "^10.0.2",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.0-beta.2",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "^1.0.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "husky": "^7.0.2",
    "karma": "^6.3.4",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^3.1.0",
    "karma-cli": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-mocha": "^2.0.1",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-webpack": "^5.0.0",
    "lint-staged": "^11.1.2",
    "mocha": "^9.1.1",
    "prettier": "^2.4.1",
    "sinon": "^11.1.2",
    "webpack": "^5.53.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^4.8.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^0.21.4"
  }
}
name: package.json
